title: adorne, sofTap, Home Lighting Controls, Dimmer Light Switch, 3 Way Dimmer Switch, White, Single Pole Dimmer Switch, ADTP703TUW4

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: #200,861 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)  #352 in Dimmer Switches

description: Give your basic switch a much-needed upgrade and customize your living space with the 700-watt Universal sofTap Dimmer Single-Pole/3-Way from Adorne. Designed with special Tru-Universal technology to support any light type, the Adorne ADTP703TUW4 allows you to turn lights on and off or dim them with just the soft tap of a finger. The easy, snap-in system works with your existing electrical box, making it quick and simple to install. Just pair it with any fixture and you're done! For a complete look, pair the Adorne ADTP703TUW4 with a sofTap Switch from Adorne. Clean, white finish No new wires required for typical installation Supports Incandescent, Halogen, CFL, LED, ELV, MLV, Fluorescent Automatically adapts to any load or combination of loads attached to it Use alone, or with a second switch to control the light from two locations Dimmer supports single-pole and three-way operation
availability_status: Only 9 left in stock - order soon.

customers_say: Customers find the dimmer switch works well, with one mentioning it performs great with 5 recessed LEDs. They appreciate its appearance and find it easy to install.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsAwesome enhancement to patio lighting
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2014
customer_reviews.review_snippet: This thing is sweet!  I have it connected to patio lighting.  The 30-second fade feature is a bit funky (slow fade to about 50% power then a sudden shut-off), but it is still very cool.  While the first post-install setup felt like too many steps, those steps are fairly intuitive.  Once set up, operation is very simple.  Now I have bright light when I need it and mood lighting when I want it.  Sweet.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsAdorne collection is the way to go!!
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2017
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Our newly renovated kitchen was upgraded with all Adorne electrical outlets and light switches and dimmers. The sofTap Dimmer switch matches perfectly with other Adorne parts. The contractor electrician was impressed with the build quality and ease of installation. All in all, we put in a total of 6 outlets, 1 GFCI outlet, 1 Pop-Out outlet, 1 USB outlet, 1 Sensa-dimmer switch, 1 toggle dimmer switch, 2 toggle light switches, 1 Push switch, and 1 sofTap Dimmer switch. Everyone who visited were impressed with the modern accent look.

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsLooks great and works well
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2019
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These look awesome and work well. I only bought this one on amazon as I could find the other matching items (cover plates, outlets,etc) cheaper in other stores online.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starslove the tap and it fades out to black
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2017
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Clean dimming, works with TCP LED lamps, love the tap and it fades out to black, not just snap off. Very clean look, nicer than your average dimmer.

customer_reviews.review_title: 4.0 out of 5 starsThese work as advertised, but you MUST HAVE THREE ...
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2018
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These work as advertised, but you MUST HAVE THREE WIRES.  If you are in an older building/home and DO NOT have three wires in the wall, you should consider the Adorne dimmer with the manual dimming control ( ADPD453LW2) for LED bulbs.  Note I understand the ADPD453LW2 will dim LED bulbs, but not LED fixtures with transformers, which I am told require three wires to be dimmed.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsThese are classy dimmers that are easy to install
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2016
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These are classy dimmers that are easy to install.  They give a much more modern feel, and they are competitively priced, too.

customer_reviews.review_title: 1.0 out of 5 starsThe new Le Grand product line is not backward compatible ...
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2016
customer_reviews.review_snippet: The new Le Grand product line is not backward compatible.I wanted to replace a burned dimmer that I installed 10 years ago and  found out that the new Le Grand dimmers are different in size and don't match the frame.The dimmer doesn't work, al though I'm not sure if it was malfunction when I got it or if it was burned when I connected it.All and all, I'm currently stuck without a solution but to replace the entire Le grand switches in the shared frame to a different company's switches.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2019
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Legrand moto for Adorne Collection is "it's time for a beautiful switch ". It truly is beautiful.
